title: Chapter 1478 - I Just Happened To Be Passing By
body:
Chapter 1478 - I Just Happened To Be Passing By

There was good fortune scattered across the Domain Boundary Battlefield.

It included immortal medicines, divine materials, and Grand Dao Divine Crystals born of the Laws. These were rare and precious for any Transcendent, good fortune that could only be happened upon by chance.

But the good fortune Su Yi had his sights on was special. Rather, it was unique to the Third Battleground.

It was found in a place shrouded in tribulation lightning year-round, Azure Dragon Ridge.

A long, long time ago, whenever the Domain Boundary Battlefield appeared, Nascent Divinity Transcendents of all four star domains were sure to fight over it!

This was because Azure Dragon Ridge hid the greatest good fortune of the Third Battleground—Nascent Divinity Source!

This was an extremely pure power of the Grand Dao born of the Laws of the Third Battleground.

Absorbing Nascent Divinity Source as they cultivated could thoroughly transform a Nascent Divinity Transcendent’s cultivation base. It was akin to a rebirth!
